articles.author: Luke Larsen
articles.title: 3D Is Back. This Time, You Can Ditch the Glasses - WIRED
articles.description: A new era of 3D display technology is upon us, moving far beyond anything we’ve seen in the past.
articles.content: Samsung says it performed an internal survey among what it calls its hardcore gaming demographic to find out what they wanted in a next-generation gaming display. This demographic is marked by a will… [+3369 chars]
